stimulusHtml: Bob is riding his bicycle along the same path. For 0 ≤ t ≤ 10 , Bob's velocity is modeled by B(t)= t3 - 6t2 + 300, where t is measured in minutes and B(t) is measured in meters per minute. Find Bob's acceleration at time t=5.

features.html: Johanna jogs along a straight path. For 0 ≤ t ≤ 40 , Johanna's velocity is given by a differentiable function v. Selected values of v(t), where t is measured in minutes and v(t) is measured in meters per minute, are given in the table above.
